articles.title: Amid DeepSeek’s Ongoing Hype, Microsoft Makes OpenAI’s o1 Reasoning Model Free For All Copilot Users - Wccftech
articles.description: Microsoft has recently announced that it is making OpenAI's o1 model free for all Copilot users and pushing more initiatives
articles.content: DeepSeek has become the talk of the town after beating ChatGPT, making it to the top of the Apple App Store charts, and even shaking things up in the financial market. Its R1 reasoning model got the … [+2093 chars]
